description:
TypeScript is a language for application-scale JavaScript. 
TypeScript adds optional types, classes, and modules to JavaScript. 
TypeScript supports tools for large-scale JavaScript applications for any browser, for any host, on any OS. 
TypeScript compiles to clean, readable, standards-based JavaScript. Try it out at https://www.typescriptlang.org/playground.

This is a standalone, power tool release of TypeScript for Visual Studio 2017 and 2019. It includes both the TypeScript experience for Visual Studio and a standalone compiler that can be used from the command line.
summary: TypeScript is a language for application-scale JavaScript development. It is included in Visual Studio 2017 and 2019.
author: Microsoft
